video-caption:
People of America, I bring you good tidings. The Circus (1928), a silent movie by Charlie Chaplin, is now available on Hulu for free for a limited time. Hulu is only available in the US (?), though, so if you’re outside, too bad, go get your A King in New York DVD out and watch that, I guess.

(If you are within the US, you can watch the YouTube clip linked herein in high definition on Hulu)
